long_description: The Pepper's Diplomat Polarized Sunglasses offer excellent protection from glare. They're perfect for bright sunshine or a day out on the water. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Frames feature spring hinges to accommodate a multitude of head sizes. Rubber temple ends grip during exercise and hot weather for a secure fit. Closeout.
short_description: The Pepper's Diplomat Polarized Sunglasses offer excellent protection from glare. They're perfect for bright sunshine or a day out on the water.
